pages.text: Amaranthus is a modified destroyer with several VLS on board. Two large hovercrafts are attached to the ship with a triple rod system, which can be retracted at any point to release them. Each hovercraft houses an experimental SAM system with two rotational points and a pivot, allowing it to target anything in a 360 degree radius around it.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/deployable_aa)$(l)SAM Hovercraft/$$(br)One of the hovercrafts is released, which moves to the target location. Once there, $(l)it shoots down any aircraft that cross the tile/$. The ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)8 Energy/$ to use. ($(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/deployables/amaranthus_active)SAM Hovercraft)

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/suppression)$(l)Missile Madness/$$(br)$(l)As the final blow strikes Amaranthus/$, all missiles are launced, $(l)damaging 7 random opponent tiles/$.
